title: Rapid formation of Nε-(carboxymethyl)lysine (CML) from ribose depends on glyoxal production by oxidation
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00183D, Paper

Hikari Sugawa, Tsuyoshi Ikeda, Yuki Tominaga, Nana Katsuta, Ryoji Nagai
Ribose undergoes auto-oxidation and oxidative cleavage between C-2 and C-3 to generate GO and enhance CML accumulation.
